"Casino Area":
"Welcome to the Casino Area!

The Casino Area is where ARKS have set up some additional recreational facilities in the lobby. Here, you can use 'Casino Coins' (CC) to play various games."
"Casino Coins can be earned by winning games, or by exchanging \"Casino Coin Passes\", which are given out regularly."

"You can exchange Casino Coin Passes for Casino Coins (CC). Look for the Vol Dragons in the Casino.

You can sometimes earn more Casino Coins than usual from exchanging passes, although it all comes down to luck."
